item.title: Treating the body as a machine
item.description: the analogy between our bodies as complex machines and the importance of paying heed to the signals they provide

item.description: reflections on turning 30 and the pursuit of personal growth and hobbies

item.description: the power of desires and the influence of external forces

item.description: complexity of human desires and the contemplation of becoming a parent, questioning societal norms and personal fulfillment

item.title: The journey of quitting smoking
item.description: I am well positioned to quit smoking. For good!

item.title: Creating What I Consume
item.description: personal journey of breaking away from passive consumption and embracing intentionality
